h3.a: Free Meal Service Available to Children 18 and under

div.p: Starting Monday, March 30 all children 18 and under can pick up 5 days of free grab and go breakfasts and lunches. Pickups will be every Monday from 10:00 am - 12:00 pm. Moving pick up to one day a week should make pickup more convenient for parents and will cut down on exposure for all.

a.aria-label: Read more about Free Meal Service Available to Children 18 and under

div.p:
New information regarding Pre-K enrollment for the upcoming school year.
April 14th from 2:00 pm till 6:00 pm you can come by Anderson and pick up an enrollment packet for your child. Packets will need to be completed and then mailed to Anderson. Please ensure that you include all the required documentation. For Pre-K you will need to include a copy of your child’s birth certificate, immunization record and a copy of proof of . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Pre K Enrollment 2020-2021

div.p:
For a printable 2020 - 2021 school calendar please follow the link below.
http://www.andersontrojans.org/pages/uploaded_files/2020-2021%20Calendar.pdf

The Oklahoma State Department of Education (OSDE) is excited to share the Oklahoma Family Guides for English Language Arts, Mathematics, Science, and Social Studies for Pre-K through 6th Grade.
The OSDE Family Guides are resources aligned with the Oklahoma Academic Standards and developed specifically for Oklahoma families to complement classroom learning. They illustrate what is expected of students at each grade . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Oklahoma Family Guides Pre-K - 6th
